channel.title: linux on Warm journeys of bits and bytes
channel.description: Recent content in linux on Warm journeys of bits and bytes

item.title: Writing a simple Linux Kernel
item.description: Setting up aarch64 platform within docker container on x86 architecture Docker Desktop for Mac ships with hypervisors for the host OS. The hypervisor is responsible for running a lightweight Linux kernel (LinuxKit), which is included as part of Docker Desktop. This lightweight container OS comes packaged with the QEMU emulator, and comes pre-configured with binfmt_misc to run binaries of any supported architecture. Binfmt_misc is a kernel subsystem which allows to set the magic numbers of a binary file to specific actions for their execution.
